messages.title: Working for you
messages.content: I was born and bred here and I am proud to call this area my home. My father was an NHS Doctor and my mother is a local campaigner who, for 30 years, has fought against Camden and Brent council to save local services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Marcus will fight for more police on the streets.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The best healthcare for your family
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Marcus will fight for the best healthcare for your family.
Simon Marcus will fight for more jobs and supporting local independent shops.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The best schools for our children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Marcus will fight for the best schools for our children.
Simon Marcus will fight for cleaner streets and less pollution.

issues.economy: With unemployment at a record high and our economy growing at its fastest since the recession, our long-term economic plan is working.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a career politician, I believe in living by my values and being judged by my deeds. After a successful career in small businesses, I co-founded the Boxing Academy, a leading education charity that gives a second chance to excluded teenagers at risk of gang crime and poverty.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning on issues that matter, like stopping HS2, helping new schools to open, supporting local independent shops and fighting for more police. But I want to do more for you and thatâ€™s why I am standing to be your local MP.

images.caption: Image of Simon Marcus as Campaign Candidate
